name: Repair Robots
description:
In Repair Robots 2-4 players are robots working from a shared set of punch cards. You must (between you) execute all punch cards in their entirety before they will be reloaded.

Players get points for carrying boxes to their own area. Each game is two minutes long. Most points wins.

The game is supposed to evoke a feeling of having to act within your programming - without the freedom to act as you want.

It has nothing to do with repairing things.

Controls are D-PAD + Square (or X on XBOX, or Y on NINTENDO).
Instead of pressing "OPTIONS" you can press Enter on the keyboard

Keyboard controls are also mapped:
P1: UP/DOWN/LEFT/RIGHT/SLASH
P2: W/S/A/D/Q
P3: T/G/F/H/R
P4: I/K/J/L/U
